message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get a decent chunk.  Let's see if we can both be happy.
I think 60-40 is more than fair, considering I'm the one losing value each round.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  But 70/30 is my final offer. We both still get a good amount, and we can finish this before inflation eats away too much.
Considering the inflation, I'm already losing a lot. I think 55-45 is a fair compromise, and we should settle on this before it's too late for me.
